messages.message: <!here> you might be seeing issues with running the flows on dogfood, local, and prod. We have found it’s a breaking db schema change and have reverted the PR. Things should be back to normal soon. Please fetch the latest master before running job-service locally. Any time someone runs with the breaking PR it changes the db schema and breaks all environments (dogfood, prod, other people’s local). I will be keeping an eye out on bad schema as well.
Thanks! I was just wondering why flows are taking so long to fininsh.
Dogfood and local should be good now. Prod is being pushed cc @Aaron Tami
is this related to flows disappearing from the list api?
No. This is separate. We will repro that some day eric! :smile:
